title: What happened to the Wukong Rework?

can one of the Rioters give me some insights about Wukong´s current state? A lot of people out of my Community and myself included are asking about Wukong. So, i would be very greatful if someone could say something about Wukong.

Yeah but Riot has been referencing a worker shortage since season 1. Back when they were an actual small indie company. You'd think 9 years later they'd be able to have a decent amount of artists where things aren't backed up for 6+ months.

There will always be a "shortage" Because a game this big has a lot of moving parts. You cant work on everything at once. And just hiring more people doesnt help because hiring someone takes a lot of time and energy and the more people you have on a team the slower things happen.

When they were a small indie company they could imagine a champs kit hack it together in a few weeks make a short hype video and release it.

Now, they need to have tons and tons of meetings just to decide which faction in runeterra a new champ comes from.

Same thing with art. They have meetings and meetings to decide where they should allocate artist resources. 

Yeah more people means more man hours are spent on the game but the effectiveness of each person is much lower in a company of 500 employees vs a company of 15 employees. This is why Riot always takes a conservative approach when hiring Designers and Developers. 

(Working in a startup that was 11 employees when I started and at 200 employees now I definitely understand the struggle)
